nodes.description: A rock, paper, scissors game written in Javascript. The game is played against the computer and the winner is determined by the highest score out of 5 rounds.
nodes.name: Rock, Paper, Scissors

nodes.description: A drawing game written in Javascript and modeled after the etch-a-sketch game. Mousing over the playing area, the pixels will progressively increase in darkness. Upon clearing the playing area, it will prompt the user for new grid size.
nodes.name: Etch-A-Sketch

nodes.description: A calculator app with add, subtract, multiply and divide functions. The app only evaluates a single pair of numbers at a given time. For example 12 + 7 - 5 * 3 = yields 42.
nodes.name: Calculator

nodes.description: An api for personal run stats.
nodes.name: Running Stats Server

nodes.description: A website showing the stats of all my runs.
nodes.name: Running Stats Client
